Articles.Content:
<p><img alt="image" src="http://media.tumblr.com/029295276005d87285b9343b52aa5b9c/tumblr_inline_mvklh0I8JT1rr2wit.png"/></p>

<p>Welcome to an extra spooky, midnight edition of <strong>The Daily Kerbal</strong></p>

<p><strong><img alt="image" src="http://media.tumblr.com/8c27ddebc4df124b893ab57cabaae79c/tumblr_inline_mvklkqkPwa1rr2wit.jpg"/></strong></p>

<p>Through this section, starting next week, we’ll be introducing you to all our awesome streamers over at <strong>KSPTV.</strong> But tonight we’re just happy to announce a Day of the Dead edition of <strong>Squadcast</strong>, tomorrow at <strong>18:00 CDT!</strong></p>

<p>Watch for all sorts of guests and a haunted night of gaming.</p>
